issue.title: Make TestHook interfaces as easy to use as TestListener
issue.body:
This issue is where the discussion that was started in #3381 should continue.

Related to #3388 and #3389.

issue.title: Mark the TestListener interface as deprecated
Change the test listener interface to ensure that implementations are read-only
[PHPUnit] Listener to hooks

repository.name: rector
repository.description: Instant Upgrades and Automated Refactoring of any PHP 5.3+ code

issue.body:
## Listener deprecation

- deprecated: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/3388
- removed: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/3389

## How to use hooks instead

- https://phpunit.readthedocs.io/en/8.0/extending-phpunit.html
- adding few: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/pull/3392/files

issue.title: Fix: Mark field and methods related to deprecated TestListener as deprecated
issue.body:
This PR

* [x] marks fields and methods on `TestResult` that are related to the deprecated `TestListener` as deprecated (and ignores methods in regard to code coverage)

Related to #3388.

issue.title: Remove use of TestListener
issue.body:
In PHPUnit 8, TestListener and TestListenerDefaultImplenentation are deprecated.

This is preventing PHPUnit_Selenium from supporting PHPUnit 8.*

issue.title: [PHPUnit 9.0] Add TestListenerToHooksRector
